article_title: GOP Rep. Floats Bill To Deny Benefits For Illegal Work
article_text:
GOP Rep. Floats Bill To Deny Benefits For Illegal Work

Law360, New York (March 27, 2015, 6:03 PM ET) -- Rep. Dana Rohrabacher, R-Calif., floated a bill Thursday to exclude any wages earned by undocumented workers not authorized to work in the U.S. from the sums used to calculate their Social Security benefits.



Rohrabacher introduced the ‘‘No Social Security for Illegal Immigrants Act of 2015,” or H.R. 1716, which would amend a portion of the Social Security Act to exclude from creditable wages and self-employment income any wages earned for services by aliens that were illegally performed in the U.S. and self-employment income derived from a...

To view the full article, register now.
